description: Elven Chainmail, light and durable, woven from mithril and enchanted for protection
Dwarven Plate Armor, heavy and resilient, forged from the finest steel of the Lonely Mountain
Rohan's Rider Armor, sturdy leather reinforced with steel, suitable for swift horseback combat
Gondorian Knight Armor, a full set of steel armor, symbolizing the strength of Minas Tirith
Wizard's Robes, imbued with protective spells and made of a seemingly simple, yet resistant fabric
Orcish Leather Armor, rugged and rough, providing basic protection
Hobbit's Cloak, a simple cloak offering camouflage and basic defense
Uruk-Hai Breastplate, a formidable armor piece worn by Saruman's elite warriors
Ent Bark Armor, natural armor as strong as the oldest trees, worn by the Ents
Balrog Hide, a rare and extremely tough armor, rumored to be made from the hide of a Balrog
Nazgul Cloak, a dark, ethereal armor that instills fear in the hearts of enemies
